name: Instruction Technology
short_description: A system designed for open access targeting small and medium sized businesses who wish to invest in their employees through career learning and professional skills development.  InstruTech leverages the latest breakthroughs in cognitive learning theory to delivery highly customized training using the best available technology typically only available to wealthy corporations and the largest global enterprises.  All curriculum is highly dynamic, with mobile access, is standards based, and evolves according to individualized performance measures embedded throughout each micro-segment.
summary: Employee Development & Learning System for SMBs
